entry.title: BLUEBERRY OVERNIGHT OATS 🫐💜 are my favorite new breakfast obsession! Absolutely in love with the color, texture and taste of these! • INGREDIENTS • (serves 3) 1.5 cups rolled oats 3 Tbsp chia seeds 3 Tbsp hemp seeds 3 Tbsp slivered almonds 2 Tbsp raisins
